refnamediv.refpurpose: General function for querying information about LEVELSET objects.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: General function for querying information about LEVELSET objects.

listitem.para: V = gf_levelset_get(LS,'values',int nls) Return the vector of dof for nls funtion. If nls is 0, the method return the vector of dof for the primary level-set funtion. If nls is 1, the method return the vector of dof for the secondary level-set function (if any).

V = gf_levelset_get(LS,'values',int nls) Return the vector of dof for nls funtion. If nls is 0, the method return the vector of dof for the primary level-set funtion. If nls is 1, the method return the vector of dof for the secondary level-set function (if any).
mf = gf_levelset_get(LS,'mf') Return a reference on the MeshFem object.
z = gf_levelset_get(LS,'memsize') Return the amount of memory (in bytes) used by the level-set.
